review: Excellent!. I would highly recommend this doctor based on his skill and patient friendly attitude. thank u

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review:
She is so friendly and will describe your current state of health precisely and politely. 
Very much satisfied with her treatment especially during operation. 
We opted for C section  she advised us to go for normal but we had our decision. She was on time at OT and the whole operation was so smooth that my wife did not have any issue at all. Neither pre-op nor post-op. 
Lots of thanks to you Ambika ma'am.

I recommend you ppl to go and consult with Dr. Ambika without any doubt.

tags: Wait time,
review: You cannot book an appointment without paying at the front desk. we called 4 times asking for an appointment amd was told that we will get a call which we never did.when we went to the hospital we were told to pay first and then we will get an appointment.***** **** **** ****** ******* ********** ******** **********

tags: None
review: She is a very rude lady. Doesn't care for patient's feelings. She's the most indecent doctor I have ever visited to. I went to her with my mom. She asked my mom to go out for a moment and then scolded me very badly for not bringing my previous prescription, (which had only pain killers written in it) for half n hour very badly. I was almost about to cry. She treated me very badly. I recommend everyone to avoid going to her. This is my sincere suggestion.

review: Very nice Dr, i was having a thin uterus of 0.3 mm n was with lots of pain,but Dr ambika v had given me a healthy pregnancy n a delivery.Thank you so much I suggest every pregnant women to consult Dr Ambika.v

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: This is my wife's second visit for pregnancy scan. Dr. Ambika is very approachable. diagnose the patient very well. Not only answers our questions raised but also tells how to proceed with it. Gives pictorial representation of baby growth. gave us diet plan. we are really happy with her services. We definitely recommend her. The radiologist Dr. Chitra  is calm and composed. Dr. Ambika also advised us on other problems which others generally do not entertain.
